TER.TERcoder
Class VerifyRecommendationParameters

java.lang.Object
  TER.TERcoder.VerifyRecommendationParameters

public class VerifyRecommendationParameters
extends java.lang.Object

This class assures that the values given by the user are compatible with the Recommendation for image data coding of the CCSDS.

Version:
1.2
Author:
Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

verifyParameter

Verify Parameters defined in this class

Parameters:
inputParameter - definition in this class
minValue - minimum allowed values
maxValue - maximum allowed values
Returns:
a boolean that indicates if the parameters are allowed
